title: Missy's First Mission
description: The US Government has avoided using supernaturals in the past, concerned that public knowledge of their existence will pose greater risks than any benefits. But, after Missy agrees to help her Paranormal Branch buddies and one thing leads to another ... the question then becomes whether Missy can somehow provide assistance during an international crisis, without the world learning about her supernatural powers and abilities. Meanwhile, when Missy interferes with the sexual harassment at West Point by going around and putting everyone there on notice, she becomes the target. Controlling herself ... doing things in plain sight which almost look humanly possible ... that just might be her greatest ability.
author: P.G. Allison
